name: Anti-Kickback, Fraud, Stark, and Marketing - Where are the Landmines?
content: With the increasing amendments in the healthcare industry, filing of false documentation and files has also increased with time. It is vital for an organization to exterminate any exposure or charges against it. Join the session and focus on the practical requirements and operations, principles of compliance and the basic elements. William Copeland, our distinguished speaker will assist you in evading the false claims in the latest data safety technology and marketing responsibility. Areas Discussed: • Federal False Claims • Federal Anti-Kickback Statute • Federal Anti-Referral Law (Stark I & 2) • Importance of compliance as an effective tool Who Will Benefit: • Healthcare providers • Related service providers, radiology, radiation therapy, • Nutrient and prescription drug manufacturers • Medical equipment suppliers • Practice Owners/ Administrators and Providers • Risk Management • Medical Providers including Registered Nurses, Physician Assistants, and Administrative Staff
